loveLetter: Every moment with you feels like a gift. You make life brighter. Thank you for being you. I love you more every day.
reasons: Your smile brightens my whole day
You always know how to make me laugh
You believe in me even when I doubt myself
Your kindness inspires me to be better
You make even ordinary moments feel special
You're my favorite person to do nothing with
Your support means the world to me
You see the best in everyone
Life is simply better with you in it

secretMessage: You found my secret! You're the best thing that ever happened to me. Forever yours.
